{X}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact an opponent controls with mana value X or less.

Vigilance
{1}, {T}: Name a card. Target player reveals the top of their library. If the named card is revealed, exile it. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any time can be spent to cast that spell.
Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

{U}, {T}: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a card from it. At the beginning of that player's next end step, they discard that card.
The Bad Batch [i](When this creature enters, target player may put a creature card with Bad Batch into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]

Other creatures you control are goaded.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you may reveal the top card of your library until you reveal a creature with the same creature type as it. Put that card into your hand, and the rest at the bottom of your library in a random order.
Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

Flash, Vigilance

Master [i](You can have two commanders if one has Master and the other has Apprentice.)[/i]

The Zillo Beast costs {1} less for each time a land has entered or left the graveyard this turn.

Whenever ARC Troopers attacks, up to one target creature has base power 1 until the end of combat.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.rules_text:
Menace, First strike
Double all damage Lord Vader would deal.
Whenever Lord Vader attacks, it gains Indestructible.

Reveal the top card of your library until you've revealed a creature card with mana values 1, 2, and 3. Put the first creature of each mana value onto the battlefield tapped, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Exile Brothers in Arms.

[i]Join Forces [/i]— Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana.
Each opponent creates X 1/1 colorless B1-Battledroid artifact tokens with Assault, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way plus 1. [i](Creatures with Assault must attack if able and attacks you if able.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, if each opponent does not control a creature named B1-Battledroid, exile The Clone Wars from your graveyard, then cast it transformed.

cards.rules_text: You get an emblem with “Whenever you would create a Clone-Trooper soldier creature token, create a 3/1 white Stormtrooper soldier creature token with menace and intimidate instead.” [i](That creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]

While voting, any number of target players may vote an additional time.
Whenever a vote finishes, if the outcome you voted for succeeds, you and each player who voted for that outcome draw a card.

[i]Senate Corruption[/i]— Whenever an opponent willingly chooses to vote the same way as you, both players draw a card and you put a Corruption counter on Palpatine, Supreme Chancelor.
When votes are revealed, you may remove any number of Corruption counters from Palpatine, Supreme Chancelor. Each time you do, replace target player's vote with one of yours.

While voting, you get an additional vote. 
Whenever players finish voting, each player who voted for your choice gains 2 life.

Intimidate [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)[/i]
While voting, each opponent may pay {1}. If they don't, you choose how that player votes votes this turn.

When All Terrain Reconnaissance Transport enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand unless they pay {1}.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Reach, Trample
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
When LM-432 Crab Droid enters the battlefield, exile target card from up to two different player's graveyards. If both cards shared a card type, draw a card.

Enchant creature
Tap enchanted creature and put a stun counter on it. 
At the beginning of each end step, if enchanted creature is tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
Deal 3 damage any target, 2 damage to another, and 1 damage to another. [i](Each target must be different)[/i]

[i]Secret council[/i] — When Bail Organa, Alderaan Delegate enters the battlefield, each player secretly votes for a player, then those votes are revealed. Each player draws a card for each vote they received. Then, the player with the most votes becomes the monarch.

[i]Will of the Senate[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for war or for peace. If war gets more votes, each creature your opponents control become goaded. If peace gets more votes, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

[i]Council's Dilemma[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for deregulation or regulation. Each opponent sacrifices a land and creates a treasure token for each deregulation vote and discards a card for each regulation vote.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“More troops are needed. The Republic cannot afford to let the Separatists gain any more ground!” —Senator Gume Saam[/i]

cards.rules_text: [i]Secret council[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for war or peace. Create a 2/2 white Clone-Trooper soldier creature token for each war vote. Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle for each peace vote.

[i]Will of the Senate[/i] — Starting with you, each player votes for increased or decreased military expenditure. If increased gets more votes, you may put a creature card with mana value 4 or less from your hand onto the battlefield. If decreased gets more votes, each player sacrifices a non-token creature.

Haste, Trample
When IG-227 Hailfire-Class Droid Tank deals combat damage to a player, untap it. There is an additional combat phase. 
IG-227 Hailfire-Class Droid Tank can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
Whenever a creature with a keyword counter is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, put a counter of that type on target creature you control.
